name: issuetriage
description: An automated issue triage for risk and readiness assessment

issuetriage.telemetry.enabled.description: Enable IssueTriage telemetry collection to improve automation readiness insights.

issuetriage.github.defaultRepository.description: Default owner/repository slug to preload when connecting to GitHub.

issuetriage.github.orgFilter.description: Optional organization login used to filter the repository list when connecting to GitHub.

issuetriage.github.oauthClientId.markdownDescription: GitHub OAuth application client ID used for device code authentication. Can be provided via the `ISSUETRIAGE_GITHUB_CLIENT_ID` environment variable.

issuetriage.github.oauthClientSecret.markdownDescription: GitHub OAuth application client secret used for device code authentication. Prefer setting the `ISSUETRIAGE_GITHUB_CLIENT_SECRET` environment variable instead of storing the secret in settings.

issuetriage.assessment.preferredModel.markdownDescription: Preferred OpenRouter model identifier used for initial assessments.

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
